full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 57 of 247 185 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - cross 1 Q. Okay. And he got that, your recollection is, sometime around 1994? 2 A. Correct. 3 MR. EVERDELL: All right. We can take that down. 4 5 Q. And you've also mentioned that he eventually got the Boeing 727? 6 7 A. Correct, in 2000. 8 Q. That was roughly around 2000? 9 A. Correct. 10 MR. EVERDELL: If we can display what's already in evidence as Government's Exhibit 301. 11 12 THE COURT: You may. 13 MR. EVERDELL: And show that to the jurors as well. 14 Q. That was -- that is the Boeing 727; correct? 15 A. That is correct. 16 MR. EVERDELL: Okay. You can take that down. 17 Q. You occasionally flew other planes for him as well? 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. I think we saw in one of the photos, I won't call it up, but there was a small Cessna? 20 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. But from about 1994, after Mr. Epstein sold the Hawker, till about 2001 or 2000, I think is your recollection, when he bought the Boeing, you flew primarily the Gulfstream? 23 24 A. That is correct. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017419
